entry.string: Admin will be prompted to send an email to an existing user if the user status is changed to any of the following checked options. Admin will also be notified when status is changed automatically by the system (eg when an account is set to pending and requires approval):
When user state is changed to 'pending'
When user state is changed to 'active'
When user state is changed to 'inactive'
When user state is changed to 'not valuidated'
Ask about sending a notification when an administrator:
entry.translation: E-mail küldési lehetőség amikor az adminisztrátor:

entry.string: When administrator changes a user's password
entry.translation: Az adminisztrátor megváltoztatja a felhasználó jelszavát
